name: Private Guided Tour of the Automotive Wonders of the World!
description: For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

location.address: Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

organizer.name: Classic Chase
organizer.description: Immerse yourself in an era gone by...

name: In the footsteps of the Tiger of Mysore.
description: Discover the history of Bangalore fort, its tales of glory & treachery over the past five centuries with us.The walk begins with a vegetarian breakfast. After that we take our guests to explore the remnants of Tipu's summer palace, the Bangalore fort & the armory.During the course of the walk learn how Anglo-French wars in Europe & North America had their impact in Southern India too.The guests get to learn more about Tipu's weapons on mass destruction of the 18th century & how they influenced the US national anthem & how one small Southern Indian kingdom was a thorn in the East India Company's rule.

location.address: XH5F+PFR, Tippu Sultan Palace Rd, Chamrajpet, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560018, India

organizer.description: Heritage, food & architectural walks in Bangalore.

name: Kavitayon Ki Dastak
description: Dialogues Cafe brings to you a Sunday full of kavitā and shāyari!If you love writing or just listening to Hindi poetry or couplets of shāyari or lyrical ghazals — we invite you to a poetic sundowner filled with hindi writing and sher-shāyari. Let`s get together for `Kavitāyon Ki Dastak`, an open mic — or rather an open mehfil — to set your mood and make you feel wholesome."utth ke mehfil se mat chale jānātum se raushan ye konā konā hai"Be a part of this community, share the love and lehzā with your words. Come join us to have agood time reciting, listening and absorbing the creativity of Hindi artists and shāyars. Wrap up your week with mellow vibes and be rejuvenated to start the next week afresh!Venue: Dialogues Café, KoramangalaEvery Second Sunday of the MonthTime: 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Dialogues Cafe Private Limited
organizer.description: Dialogues Cafe is a warm, homely space in Koramangala where natural light meets community vibes. Enjoy freshly made, minimalist cuisine while engaging in open mics, book clubs, and more. Whether you’re here to work, create, or connect, Dialogues Cafe is your space to belong.

name: Dialogues with Books
description: Dialogues with Books Join us for our book club meetup every third Sunday of the month. Bring along your favorite book, the book you are currently reading, or any book that had an impact on you. Share your experience reading the book with fellow bibliophiles and participate in winding and fun discussions around the joy of reading. Do all this while sipping on coffee/tea or having a hot tasty snack from our cafe! Your Host - Bharat is an avid reader with a penchant for classical literature and philosophy. He also dabbles in writing with a diverse portfolio of works across tech, philosophy, magical realism and fantasy. His reading diet includes a mix of fiction and non-fiction with his favorite novels being The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Movable feast by Hemmingway and Crime and Punishment by Dostoevsky.Note: Rs.100 as cover is part of the ticket price.

name: Dialogues Poetry Open Mic
description: Lovers of poetry and prose — this one is for you!Whether you like listening, reading or performing poems or short stories, be ready to be entertained. We are on a journey to create safe spaces for the writers in town — to share their writing with like-minded people and become part of our community. You can hold us accountable for making you have a good time!Join us at Dialogues Cafe,Koramangala from 7:30 PM onwards, on every 3rd Sunday

name: A 2 Day Kalaripayattu Workshop
description: We are hosting a 2-day Live Kalaripayattu workshop on 11th & 12 Jan 2025 (Saturday & Sunday)We are bringing to you Specially curated exercises inspired from Kalaripayattu that can be practised at the comfort of your home.What's included in the Workshop:A 2 Day Live workshop provided by Experienced Kalaripayattu Teachers on 11th & 12 Jan 2025 each.There would be 1.5 hours of a Online session 1 week prior to the workshop to brief you about the workshop and to provide Theoretical Introduction to the Kalaripayattu movements and to address other question and answers.Post workshop , there would be 1.5 hours of Online Session 1 week later to clear your doubts and address other issues related.Support through whatsapp / Call in future.This workshop is open for both Adults and Kids. There movements would be different and according to the respective age groupsBenefits of attending this Workshop:Learn Scientific , Natural Kalaripayattu Movements as a fitness routine to include in your day to day Lifestyle (no equipments required)Improve Mental Focus & MindfulnessDevelop A Stronger, Healthier Spine

name: A JIVAMUKTI Yoga Backbends Workshop led by Ninya
description: “The Gateway to Backbends: Exploring the Psoas”A JIVAMUKTI Yoga Workshop led by Ninya LehrheuerThe psoas, often referred to as the “muscle of the soul,” plays a key role in connecting the spine, pelvis, and legs—bridging not just movement, but also memory and emotional experience stored in the body. This workshop explores how releasing tension in the psoas can free us from long-held patterns, both physical and mental, that stem from the past.Aligned with the Jivamukti Focus of the Month, “What’s Inside Memory,” we’ll reflect on how the body holds echoes of past experiences and explore how mindful psoas stretching and backbending can help dissolve those imprints. Through a combination of anatomical insight, guided movement, and breath work, you’ll learn how to stabilize and expand into heart-opening backbends that cultivate liberation and presence.Join us for this journey to discover what lies within the psoas—and how unlocking it can open the heart and release the memories that keep us tethered to the past.

name: Courtyard Kids Playdate with The LooRoo Club
description: Courtyard's monthly playdate with The LooRoo Club is back!Celebrate the joy of India’s harvest festivals with a magical playdate your kids will love! January marks the season of vibrant traditions like Makar Sankranti, Pongal, Lohri, and Bihu, and we’re bringing them to life in a fun, hands-on way.Here’s what’s in store:Paint Pongal potsDecorate colorful kitesDance to lively folk songsCreate stunning rangoli designsEnjoy festive treatsFor children aged 3 to 8 years, accompanied by a parent.Give your little ones a chance to explore art, food, and culture while celebrating India’s beautiful traditions. Book your tickets now and let’s make some memories!P.S. Perfect for young kids—fun, engaging, and unforgettableTerms and ConditionsThe management bears no responsibility for any injury or damage incurred during the event.Purchase tickets exclusively from the designated ticketing platform.No refunds for no-shows or cancellations under any circumstances.Tickets are non-transferable and intended for personal use only.Event schedule and menu subject to change in case of emergencies or events beyond our control.The management will not entertain liability claims arising from the consumption of food or beverages.Parking near the event venue is at the vehicle owner's risk. Paid valet parking available at Rs. 200 per car.Ticket holders grant organizers perpetual rights to use any recorded video or still footage of their appearance on any channel, without further approval.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Yin Yoga + Sound Bath
description: Come join us this Full Moon, for a yin yoga + sound bath experience.Deepika an experienced sound bath practitioner aims in blending creative expression and sound healing to manifest desires. Followed by a guided meditation and enhanced by the soothing tones of singing bowls. This deep relaxation and focus help you feel your dreams coming to life, fostering a powerful sense of connection to your goals. This session will also have a yin yoga practice, led by Julia, integrated into the sound healing session.What to bring:Yoga matSmall pillowBlindfold/ eye mask/ scarfWater bottle

name: The Analog Club
description: Step back in time at The Analog Club, a new event series by the Studio by Copper + Cloves. Imagine walking into a busy cafe and seeing not a single phone, no-one taking selfies and no one around you scrolling. Disconnect from devices for 3 hours of unplugged experience—we'll have books, board games, music, crochet, and of course, food! But this isn't about structured activities or organised fun, just genuine connection and relaxation. The event will be fluid- you can dip into activities if you want, or you can just chat to new people or graze at our high tea counter!Meet new friends, sketch, or read a book in quiet solitude (without being surrounded by people lost in their phones). We will not be doing social media on our phones at the event, we will only take photos with a camera.Embrace the analog experience, slow down, and reconnect in this crazy digital age! **Strictly no devices (no laptops, ipads, and you will be asked to keep your phone in a basket or in your bag- not in your pocket and no where on a table**Tickets are for entry and unlimited high tea from our renowned deli counter.

name: Film: Good Will Hunting | Movie Under the Stars
description: Join us for an open-air screening of Good Will Hunting (1997), with a three-course dinner by chef Rhea Aaron and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieGood Will Hunting (1997) tells the story of Will Hunting, a janitor at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) with extraordinary mathematical talents. Despite his potential, Will struggles with deep emotional trauma and a troubled past. When his genius is discovered, he is given the chance to study mathematics but must also undergo therapy. Guided by a compassionate therapist, Sean, Will confronts his personal demons, builds relationships, and starts to reconcile with his true potential. The film explores themes of self-discovery, love, and the power of human connection.3-Course Dinner Menu by chef Rhea AaronSoup:Corn ChowderMains:Good ol' Chicken Patty Burgers with Fries (NV)Red Bean Burger with Fries (V)Dessert:Caramel Apple Tart______Terms and ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: Friday Dinner Table
description: Friday Dinner Table: From Strangers to FriendsJoin us for an evening of great food, warm conversations, and meaningful connections! Whether you’re new to the city, looking to meet like-minded people, or simply want to unwind after a busy week, this is the perfect space to relax and make new friends.At our Friday Dinner Table, strangers quickly become friends over shared stories, laughter, and delicious dishes. The setting is casual, the vibe is welcoming, and the goal is simple: genuine connections with wonderful people.Bring your appetite for food and friendship – we’ll take care of the rest!

name: Eggless Cake Baking
description: Eggless Baking  at Flourish BakeryDiscover the art of eggless baking in our hands-on masterclass, designed for both beginners and seasoned bakers. At Flourish, we specialize in creating exquisite cakes with no compromise on taste, texture, or quality.In this immersive class, you’ll learn to bake from scratch using high-quality ingredients,  flour, organic real ingredients, fresh cream sourced from France, and locally grown berries and fruits. We provide everything you need for the session, so you can focus on perfecting your skills and enjoying the process.During the class, you will create:A classic chocolate cake with a rich, indulgent flavor.A delightful butterscotch cake with a perfect balance of sweetness.A luscious fruit cake bursting with fresh, locally sourced fruits.A decadent Black Forest cake, layered with cream and cherries.These recipes are versatile, practical, and guaranteed to impress. Just because they’re eggless doesn’t mean you’re sacrificing flavor or quality. Whether you’re baking for dietary preferences, lifestyle choices, or just for fun, these cakes will be a hit in any setting.Best of all, you’ll take home everything you make, along with newfound confidence and skills to recreate these masterpieces in your own kitchen.Join us at Flourish and experience the joy of baking without limits.

name: Basics to Cake Baking (with Egg)
description: Cake Baking Workshop at Flourish BakeryJoin us for an exclusive cake baking workshop at Flourish Bakery, where you’ll learn the art of baking with the finest ingredients and expert techniques. This interactive, hands-on class is designed to teach you everything you need to create stunning cakes from scratch.In this workshop, you’ll master the skills to bake and decorate:A decadent Black Forest cake, layered with cream and cherries.A delightful seasonal fruit cake showcasing fresh, locally sourced fruits.A rich and indulgent caramel chocolate cake.A timeless classic chocolate cake with the perfect crumb.Why Join This Workshop?Premium Ingredients: We use only the best—organic, real ingredients, fresh cream, and seasonal fruits for exceptional results.Small Class Size: With no more than 6 participants, you’ll enjoy personalized attention and a friendly, interactive environment.Take Home Your Creations: Everything you bake is yours to take home and share (or keep for yourself!).From Scratch: Learn to bake cakes entirely from scratch—no shortcuts, just authentic techniques and valuable tips.Informative & Fun: This is more than just a class—it’s a memorable experience filled with learning, creativity, and a touch of indulgence.Whether you’re a novice baker or looking to refine your skills, this workshop is the perfect opportunity to expand your repertoire and create cakes that impress every time.Spaces are limited, so reserve your spot today and get ready to bake up something extraordinary!

name: Popular Tea Cakes Workshop
description: Popular Tea Cakes Workshop at Flourish BakeryIndulge in the joy of baking in our Tea Cakes Workshop, one of the most loved experiences at Flourish Bakery. Designed for both beginners and seasoned bakers, this class offers a hands-on journey into creating classic yet uniquely flavored tea cakes—all baked from scratch using the finest ingredients.During this workshop, you’ll learn to bake four irresistible cakes:Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting: A moist, spiced delight topped with a creamy, tangy frosting.Sticky Toffee Date Cake with Caramel Sauce: A luscious, rich cake paired with a decadent caramel drizzle.Natural Flavored Orange Pound Cake: Bursting with zesty, fresh orange flavor—perfectly light and fragrant.Banana Cake with Chocolate Chips: A comforting favorite with a delightful chocolatey twist.Why Join This Workshop?Bake from Scratch: Master every step of creating these tea cakes, from mixing the batter to perfecting the final touch.Familiar Yet Unique Flavors: Enjoy familiar flavors elevated with creative, unique touches that will surprise and delight.Take-Home Goodies: Everything you bake is yours to take home and share (or savor yourself).Comprehensive Booklets: You’ll receive detailed recipe booklets to guide your future baking adventures.Interactive & Fun: This hands-on, small-group class ensures a personal and enjoyable learning experience.Join us and create tea cakes that are perfect for sharing over a cup of tea, gifting to loved ones, or simply enjoying at home. Spaces are limited, so book your spot today and experience the magic of baking at Flourish Bakery!
